title: (x) 2nd Annual CSC OptiFair 2007 scripts - Nuptial Script, Young Baroque {Loremipsum, Mike E}
content:
Hello, I’m a new user.  
Does anyone know these off  
the top of their heads?  
Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705151824im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/fontexample_5560.jpg)

~S

 [‹ Weird handwritten connected script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705151824/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38326 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Simple geometric sans - Century Gothic {Eric Hague} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705151824/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38327 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Plan B

comments.content:
Wow, that’s pretty impressive.  
Thanks so much. Hopefully  
I can return the favor.

Prost!

I know the script typeface as Yves Script from “Novelfonts Corp.”, but I suspect this might be a rip-off of another script.

Edit: removing link to rip-off of copyrighted font.
